dc_title_s: Planisphaerium terrestre cum utroque coelesti hemisphaerio ... = Vlakke ared-kloot met het beide hemelsch half-rond ... / opera et studio A.F. Zürneri.
dc_description_s: Surrounded by two celestial maps, 26 astronomical and geographical diagrams, and ill. Includes text explaining the ill. Includes ills. of the Norwegian whirlpool, tides and Mt. Etna. 1 map : hand col., mounted on cloth ; 2 hemispheres each 28 cm. in diam., on sheet 51 x 58 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
